# anypoint_team (Resource)

Creates a `team` for your `org`.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **org_id** (String)
- **parent_team_id** (String)
- **team_name** (String)

### Optional

- **ancestor_team_ids** (List of String)
- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **team_type** (String)

### Read-Only

- **created_at** (String)
- **last_updated** (String)
- **team_id** (String)
- **updated_at** (String)
